query:
SELECT 
            b.id, 
            b.name,
            b.created_at,
            COUNT(
                CASE WHEN 
                    c.status = 'Closed'
                    THEN 1 END
                ) as "successful_contracts!",
            COUNT(
                CASE WHEN 
                    c.status = 'Cancelled'
                    THEN 1 END
                ) as "failed_contracts!"
        FROM borrowers b
        LEFT JOIN contracts c ON c.borrower_id = b.id
        WHERE b.id = $1
        GROUP BY b.name, b.id
